GP12lip_1_iu:24909: saha tadā ca jagāma tayāṃbayā LiP_1,72.94c
GP12lip_1_iu:25007: sahaiva cāruhya tadā dvipaṃ taṃ pragṛhya vālavyajanaṃ vivasvān LiP_1,107.26/a
GP12lip_1_iu:25018: saṃkalpaṃ caiva dharmaṃ ca hy LiP_1,38.13c
GP12lip_1_iu:25127: saṃdhyāṃśe ca gate tu vai LiP_1,39.10b
GP12lip_1_iu:25134: saṃnaddhaś ca tu yo raśmiḥ LiP_1,60.24a
GP12lip_1_iu:25352: sā ca sārdhaṃ bhavānyā vai LiP_1,84.25c
GP12lip_1_iu:25355: sā cāpyenaṃ tuhinagirisutā śaṅkaraṃ devadevaṃ LiP_1,92.33c
GP12lip_1_iu:25409: sā niśamya vacanaṃ tadā śubhaṃ LiP_1,64.70a
GP12lip_1_iu:25522: sāṃkhyāḥ prakṛteḥ paramaṃ tvāṃ viditvā LiP_1,21.86c
GP12lip_1_iu:25618: siṃhaṃ mṛgāṇāṃ vṛṣabhaṃ gavāṃ ca LiP_1,58.13a
GP12lip_1_iu:25742: suptvā bhuktvā ca vai viprāḥ LiP_1,89.72a
GP12lip_1_iu:25891: suṣuve sā tu vai prabhā LiP_1,66.18b
GP12lip_1_iu:26127: somaś ca vai śrutiḥ ṣaṣṭhī LiP_1,5.47c
GP12lip_1_iu:26284: stoṣye hi tuṣṭāya śivāya tubhyam LiP_1,72.152d
GP12lip_1_iu:26285: stoṣye hy atoṣyaṃ praṇipatya mūrdhnā LiP_1,72.156d
GP12lip_1_iu:26565: smarec ca tat tathā madhye LiP_1,88.4c
GP12lip_1_iu:26588: smṛtvā jagattrayamanena hatāḥ surāś ca LiP_1,97.17b
GP12lip_1_iu:26669: svayaṃ gataścātra gaṇaiś ca sārdham LiP_1,72.95d
GP12lip_1_iu:26674: svayaṃ piṣṭvā ca sā tadā LiP_1,107.8b
GP12lip_1_iu:26817: svāṃ tanuṃ sa tato brahmā LiP_1,70.267c
GP12lip_1_iu:26926: halaiś ca phālair musalair bhuśuṇḍair LiP_1,72.72a
GP12lip_1_iu:26991: hitvā putrāṃś ca dārāṃś ca LiP_1,40.68a
